com.almasb.fxgl.gameplay

Class GameWorld

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.almasb.ents.EntityWorld
      • com.almasb.fxgl.gameplay.GameWorld
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    UpdateEventListener

    public final class GameWorld
extends com.almasb.ents.EntityWorld
implements UpdateEventListener
    Represents pure logical state of game. Manages all entities and their state.
    Author:
    Almas Baimagambetov (AlmasB) (almaslvl@gmail.com)

      • getEntitiesByType

        public List<com.almasb.ents.Entity> getEntitiesByType(Enum<?>... types)
        This query only works on entities with TypeComponent. If called with no arguments, all entities are returned. Warning: object allocation.
        Parameters:
        types - entity types
        Returns:
        entities (do NOT modify)

      • getClosestEntity

        public Optional<com.almasb.ents.Entity> getClosestEntity(com.almasb.ents.Entity entity,
                                                         Predicate<com.almasb.ents.Entity> filter)
        Returns the closest entity to the given entity with given filter. The given entity itself is never returned.

        If there no entities satisfying the requirement, Optional.empty() is returned. Warning: object allocation.

        Parameters:
        entity - selected entity
        filter - requirements
        Returns:
        closest entity to selected entity with type

      • getEntitiesFiltered

        public List<com.almasb.ents.Entity> getEntitiesFiltered(Predicate<com.almasb.ents.Entity> predicate)
        Returns a list of entities which are filtered by given predicate. Warning: object allocation.
        Parameters:
        predicate - filter
        Returns:
        list of entities that satisfy given predicate (do NOT modify)

      • getEntitiesInRange

        public List<com.almasb.ents.Entity> getEntitiesInRange(javafx.geometry.Rectangle2D selection)
        Returns a list of entities which are partially or entirely in the specified rectangular selection. This query only works on entities with BoundingBoxComponent. Warning: object allocation.
        Parameters:
        selection - Rectangle2D that describes the selection box
        Returns:
        list of entities in the range (do NOT modify)

      • getCollidingEntities

        public List<com.almasb.ents.Entity> getCollidingEntities(com.almasb.ents.Entity entity)
        Returns a list of entities which colliding with given entity. Note: CollidableComponent is not considered. This query only works on entities with BoundingBoxComponent.
        Parameters:
        entity - the entity
        Returns:
        list of entities colliding with entity

      • getEntitiesByLayer

        public List<com.almasb.ents.Entity> getEntitiesByLayer(RenderLayer layer)
        Returns a list of entities which have the given render layer index. This query only works on entities with MainViewComponent.
        Parameters:
        layer - render layer
        Returns:
        list of entities in the layer

      • getEntityAt

        public Optional<com.almasb.ents.Entity> getEntityAt(javafx.geometry.Point2D position)
        Returns an entity at given position. The position x and y must equal to entity's position x and y.

        Returns Optional.empty() if no entity was found at given position. This query only works on entities with PositionComponent.

        Parameters:
        position - point in the world
        Returns:
        entity at point

      • getEntityByID

        public Optional<com.almasb.ents.Entity> getEntityByID(String name,
                                                      int id)
        Returns an entity whose IDComponent matches given name and id.

        Returns Optional.empty() if no entity was found with such combination. This query only works on entities with IDComponent.

        Parameters:
        name - entity name
        id - entity id
        Returns:
        entity that matches the query or Optional.empty()

      • getSelectedEntity

        public Optional<com.almasb.ents.Entity> getSelectedEntity()
        Returns last selected (clicked on by mouse) entity.
        Returns:
        selected entity

      • selectedEntityProperty

        public javafx.beans.property.ObjectProperty<com.almasb.ents.Entity> selectedEntityProperty()
        See Also:
        getSelectedEntity()

      • setLevel

        public void setLevel(Level level)
        Set level to given. Resets the world. Adds all level entities to the world.
        Parameters:
        level - the level
